name: Wibble
description:
A challenging, silly, physics-based game.
Wibble is an adorable squid-like alien struggling with Earth's gravity.

Take control of Wibble's wobbly limbs. Maneuver through 30 increasingly difficult levels and face challenging obstacles.




Movement is relative to the direction the body is facing. Place yourself in Wibble's shoes - er, tentacle appendages - and Become one with Wibble!




Features
  • Steam Achievements
    Compete against your friends and the world to get the best times! May the best Wibble win.

  • Unlockables
    Unlock skins and props by progressing through the game. Customize your Wibble!

  • Challenging Levels
    Journey through 30 unique levels, each with their own set of obstacles. Battle through guillotines, cannons, gravity and even cabbages.




Master the controls. Help Wibble get to the other side!
